statements: DELETE FROM Ingredients WHERE available_quantity < minimum_stock_level AND unit_of_measurement = 'grams';
DELETE FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE current_quantity < 10 AND restock_threshold > 20;
DELETE FROM restock_log WHERE restock_quantity > 100 AND restock_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM Ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND unit_of_measurement = 'kg'
DELETE FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < 10 AND unit_of_measure = 'kg';
DELETE FROM stock_history WHERE stock_level < 10 AND stock_date < '2022-10-31 23:59:59';
